DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare tolerability 3 treatment regimen contain Adapalene 0.1 % / Benzoyl Peroxide 2.5 % Gel Adapalene 0.1 % /Benzoyl Peroxide 2.5 % Gel standard daily overnight application 12 week treatment acne vulgaris . The efficacy four treatment regimen also evaluate .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Four Different Regimens Adapalene 0.1 % / Benzoyl Peroxide 2.5 % Gel Acne Vulgaris
DOC.criteria: Male female Subjects race , age 12 35 year inclusive Subjects mild moderate facial acne vulgaris Subjects skin phototype I IV Subjects 1 nodule cyst face , Subjects acne conglobata , acne fulminans , secondary acne ( chloracne , druginduced acne , etc . )
